title: What is something worth knowing for 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: • Knowing yourself, your self respect and your worth instead of thinking and too much caring for others who doesn't have feelings and value for you that how much you care and perior them in your life. • your parents is your true and best friend and they are too important than the fake person who act like your best friend. • everyone leaves you at a time. No one is permanent in your life. Even not your parents live with you permanently in your life. Remember it. So what you expect to live with others. • career is more important than your love. Professional life is perior than personal life. • self education is more important than formal education. • your health is more important than your marks. Because most of the students sacrifices their health just because of a piece of paper. Class 10th and 12th exams are near so don't think and afraid too much of it, because it's your first exam and difficulty of your life. It's a starting kids…. No!! Don't take too much tension just take a deep breath and be ready for every challenges which you will going to face in your future. Remember “THE MORE YOU STRUGGLE, THE MORE YOU GROW “ • live your life not just spend it. • remember next opportunity come to you in next minute of your life. • failure doesn't permanent. It's your opportunity and chance to improve your mistakes. • success is not permanent. It just a step towards achievement. • Upvoting this answer to give me more motivation to write is also very important to know. I hope you like it and it's worth to know all these above point and please upvote this answer. I know my english is not pretty good but I try to write. -shalini Maurya Dhanyavaad

Well, I agree about making sure your spiritual affairs are in order, 1st and foremost. 2) Digital Marketing, Affiliate Marketing, Simply Put, Making Money ONLINE is Just Getting Started. Many People feel it’s saturated. However, just think about it. We BARELY even have a full generation of people on the internet. For the People who say the Online Arena is saturated, Well, That’s like saying the automotive industry was saturated in 1935. That should be all you need to know about, “It’s Time To Take Action & Start Trying to Earn Money Online…Somehow..Some Way…Right Now. 3) The Final, and Just as ‘Important Thing to Know in 2020’, Is to set out Each and Every Morning with the FULL Intention of Being Kind to People. That may seem obvious but Too Few are Practicing This Action. It’s not easy sometimes but SOOOO Worth It…For YOU & Them. Hope That Helps! All the Best, Chaz Thomas Your Digital Mindset | Build Your Business
